entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, who is riding the dragon. (Excerpt: 'Crouching low over the beast’s neck, he clung tight to the metallic scales...')

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is also riding the dragon and swearing at the top of his voice. (Excerpt: 'Behind him, whether from delight or fear he could not tell. Ron kept swearing at the top of his voice...')

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend, who is also riding the dragon and sobbing. (Excerpt: 'Behind him, whether from delight or fear he could not tell. Ron kept swearing at the top of his voice, and Hermione seemed to be sobbing...')

entities.name: dragon
entities.description: The dragon that Harry, Ron, and Hermione are riding. (Excerpt: 'Therewasnomeansofsteering;thedragoncouldnotsee where it was going...')
